metadata.name: Hope
metadata.description:
Grateful for my spiritual practice and meditation, I was always able to find hope on my darkest days. 

These images are a collection of digital photos, from my daily walks on South Beach, Miami, during recovery from major emergency surgery. 
Three years prior I had been diagnosed with Ulcerative Colitis and spent a tumultuous time in and out of hospitals, moving around, fighting for my life. In February 2020 I faced death and surrendered to the removal of my colon. I started over, learning how to walk and care for my life with an ileostomy. 

This series uses the phrases Hope Springs Eternal, As Above So Below, and Sea The Change, to add another layer of meaning to each multi photo piece. As well as, focus the subject and emotions toward a shared theme. A time of peace, renewal, healing, creativity and transformation in visual form, to affirm the endless cycle of life and power of the human spirit.  
 
8.3MB Dimensions: 4400 x 4400 Resolution: 220 x 220  
Gratitude & Seaspiration
